f31905.value: The  principal  activity  of  the  Group  is  that  of  a  direct-to-consumer  online  pension  provider.  The Group seeks to make its UK customers ‘Pension Confident’ by giving them complete control and clarity over their retirement savings. The Group helps its customers to combine their pensions into one new online plan where they can contribute, forecast outcomes, invest effectively, and withdraw their pensions (from the age of 55), all from the palm of their hand.
